name: Candyland soda
description:
Candyland soda is a very cool and exciting match-3 game, swipe to match and make three or more items of the same color together, they can be eliminated. enter into the delicious but adventurous world of Candyland soda!

Crush pop and blast away!
This game is simple yet addictive and has great graphics display, animation, sound effect and background music that will enhance your eagerness to play the game.

100 awesome levels to play right away!


- Match three or more identical gems.
- Match four or more gems will produce incredible results.
- Quick clear gems can get extra points.
- Spectacular boosters and bonuses that will help you along the way
- Fun tasks on every level

This is a really popular game that will engage all ages to play, download it for free today!
